attributes.action: Open The Doors Of Churches - Synagogues - Mosques - Temples
attributes.background: Religious places of worship - such as churches, synagogues, mosques, temples etc - should open their doors at night - 9pm > 9am - to allow the homeless to sleep in a safe, comfortable, warm environment...

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This would be the responsibility of individual Churches, Synagogues, Mosques and Temples.
